name: Snake 3D (itch) (Jan Schneider)
description:
This is a small snake game I developed in my freetime over the last month. Developing this game was quite enjoyable as the scope was rather small, but still took me about 45 hours of work to get to this stage.

In the future I want to focus more on compact games with small scopes or just prototypes as these games are more likely to get finished. 

Have fun playing and stay tuned for more!

Sound effects and music obtained from zapsplat.com
